text: "Costumbres" is a song by American singer Selena. The song was written by Juan Gabriel, a Mexican songwriter, who gave the rights to Selena to record. The song first appeared on Dulce Amor (1988). It became a single off of Siempre Selena (1996). The remix version is included in Siempre Selena. ==Chart performance== Chart (1996) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 15 U.S. Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 13 ==La India version== "Costumbres" is a song by Puerto Rican singer La India. She recorded the song as a tribute for Selena. It was included as a cover version on her album Sobre el Fuego. It peaked on the Hot Latin Tracks chart at number eight.
